body:
Thank you!

I feel terrible, I should have been cautious (I need sleep).. My HDR was
currupt, as I stopped my Java procedures in the middle... I am sorry..

Yes, pextrem works fine..  Thank you Dr.Jacob for -s -a.

Vaib


On 5 February 2014 18:38, Guglielmetti, Robert <Robert.Guglielmetti at nrel.gov
